actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1586 of title 10, United States Code, to extend certain assignment rotation rights to civilian Defense Establishment employees from Guam, the Virgin Islands, or Puerto Rico.

summary.text: Makes civilian employees of the Defense Establishment in Guam, the Virgin Islands, or Puerto Rico eligible for assignment or rotation to duty outside such territories and the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1586 of title 10, United States Code, to extend certain assignment rotation rights to civilian Defense Establishment employees from Guam, the Virgin Islands, or Puerto Rico.
